subject: Please respond to your loan application  Wed, 16 May 2007 03:42:26 -0500
body:
Dear Home-0wner,

Are you still paying too much for your mortgage?  Refinance with us for lower rate.  You loan has been pre-approved.

You can receive $279,000 for
$678 per month save 42%.

Please respond Today. 
http://7pgo.cn/?NMDUE

Vivian Morales
LendingTree Department


It often happens that the real tragedies of life occur in such an inartistic manner that they hurt us by their crude violence, their absolute incoherence, their absurd want of meaning, their entire lack of style.
